title: ATFunded Check website
description: ATFunded, established January 2025, is a CFD firm offering two program formats — 2 Steps and 1 Step — and supporting the MT5 trading platform. The firm’s public feedback is recorded as a 4.8/5 review score from 12 reviews (Trust Pilot says 4.6 in one spot, 4.8 in another, using 4.6 from header). ATFunded’s program structure provides a two‑step evaluation path and a one‑step evaluation path. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
forbidden_strategies: Max Open Trades: Max 4 open trades per pair.
Minimum Hold Time: 50% of trades must be held > 1 min.
Max Lot Size Rule (Pro): 10k(1 FX/0.5 Other)

payout_policy.details: Pro: 50% split first two payouts, then 80%. Max payout cap first two: $5k. 2 Phase: 80% split, no cap. Bonus: 100% refund of initial fee upon 3rd payout (2 Phase). Activation Fee (Pro): $149 (or $25 for 10k) after passing Phase 1.

firm_rules.copy_trading: Allowed between ATFunded accounts or own accounts. Forbidden from third parties.
firm_rules.expert_advisor: Allowed (except for copy trading others, scalping, arbitrage, HFT).
firm_rules.news_trading: Prohibited 5 mins before/after high-impact events. Violation leads to profit removal.
firm_rules.weekend_holding: Weekend/overnight holding allowed. Week trading (crypto) not allowed.
forbidden_strategies: Max Open Trades: Max 4 open trades per pair.
Minimum Hold Time: 50% of trades must be held > 1 min.
Max Lot Size Rule (Pro): 10k(1 FX/0.5 Other)

seo_content:
ATFunded Technical Infrastructure

ATFunded, established January 2025, is a CFD firm offering two program formats — 2 Steps and 1 Step — and supporting the MT5 trading platform. The firm’s public feedback is recorded as a 4.8/5 review score from 12 reviews (Trust Pilot says 4.6 in one spot, 4.8 in another, using 4.6 from header). ATFunded’s program structure provides a two‑step evaluation path and a one‑step evaluation path. Verified by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
